name: SOW Online
description:
[The game is not finished developed. Only a demo is available yet.]

A offline campaign based, online military simulation shooter, hyper early under-development game. This game gets you in battle virtually inside your PC. You'll be controlling or servicing for your country rights. Get in different special units, complete your objectives like a soldier!!!

Follow the game on youtube - http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH4eQsrZ-z_YHWczrfxU7Ow
